content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #258

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 52

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: CDS Service Respons - Suggestion
Type: A-T :pencil2:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

Unique identifier for this suggestion. For details see Suggestion Tracking Analytics

Comment:
This a hard link, a relative would be better.

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We are removing Analytics for 1.0. However, we will keep the uuid field OPTIONAL on Suggestions as it would be beneficial to EHRs for internal logging and auditing.

We need to update the uuid documentation to state its usefulness in the absence of Analytics

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #258

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #258

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
We are removing Analytics for 1.0. However, we will keep the uuid field OPTIONAL on Suggestions as it would be beneficial to EHRs for internal logging and auditing.

We need to update the uuid documentation to state its usefulness in the absence of Analytics

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
